stanford.androidlib.graphics

Class GArrow

  • java.lang.Object
    • stanford.androidlib.graphics.GObject
      • stanford.androidlib.graphics.GLine
        • stanford.androidlib.graphics.GArrow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GScalable

    public class GArrow
extends GLine
    This class represents a line with an arrowhead at one or both ends. This class is still under development and is currently undocumented. A future release of the library will document the methods fully.
